title: New idea for Tristana skin? ( No art though)
body: Riot should make a Thanksgiving themed skin for Tristana. Her rocket can be replaced with a cornucopia and instead of shooting metal balls, she can be shooting food! Her autos could be like nuts or fruit. Her crits could be a spicy or flaming food of sorts. Her W could be the cornucopia shooting juice or soup and Tristana could land with a splash. Her E could be a turkey going up cooking stages with each auto until it becomes red and black and explodes( slightly cooked turkey -> a bit more brown -> More juicier and almost fully cooked -> Cooked turkey that's overstuffed and about to explode). Her ultimate could be like...a huge ear of corn or fruit that explodes and pushes target away with an explosion/huge splash. Please upvote if you want to see this idea come to _**fruition**_! **(Pun INTENDED)**
